definition: report the loss to the authorities concerned

sentences.english: Assign personnel to handle reported losses and claims by displaced guests.
sentences.chinese: 安排人员负责记录客人报失。

sentences.english: This coupon will become invalid if defaced or damaged and is not replaceable once lost or damaged.
sentences.chinese: 本劵不设报失，逾期使用或损毁均作无效。

sentences.english: The man whose wallet had been stolen immediately reported the theft.
sentences.chinese: 钱包被偷的那个男子立即报失。

sentences.english: The bank froze my credit card account after I reported it stolen.
sentences.chinese: 在我报失信用卡后，银行冻结了我的信用卡户头。

sentences.english: Next meeting, you'll all trade guns and report the gun you bought as stolen.
sentences.chinese: 下个礼拜，你们相互换枪，然后把自己的枪报失。

sentences.english: Have you reported it to the police?

definition: to report the loss of something
to replace a lost or damaged SIM card, retaining one's original telephone number/SIM replacement
record entry (e.g. into a bank passbook)
identity card/also written 身份證|身份证[shen1 fen4 zheng4]
receipt (written acknowledgement of receipt of an item)
to report a case to the authorities
